channel.title: !good lord im so close! need help!
channel.description: Heres the dealio... I have portforwaded and all of that good stuff and the status checker on google says my server is on. But when my freind trys to connect it says "connecting to webserver" Then it says "Connection problem". Thats the dilema. Any ideas.

item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

I don’t know it loads the login screen for him so theres nothing wrong with the cache and its uploaded with the same files in the client folder only thing that changed was the server ip for others to connect. The source is cradlescape source [PI] so would anything need to be changed in the source files for it to connect?

lol he portforward, its just the client wont connect to the source and the no-ip is set to the hostname he made

is still he cant get his server onn?? so i see it as hosting problem, and it should be dumped in a new section

also if its his client, then he is also in wrong section then he should go to client help, not server help
